page.title: 03RELIGION
page.content: {The Parish Church}- dedicated to St.Mary and celebrated annually on 1st.Sunday after September 19th. Rev.Ogden-Swift, vicar for 5 years, has christened 197 babies and prepared 50 twelve year olds for confirmation. Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Scouts attend church parade monthly. Sunday Services:Communion 8 & 10.30 a.m.;Evensong 6 p.m.;Sunday School 10.30a.m..Communion services held on Wednesday mornings and Thursday evenings. 100 attend church weekly. Remembrance Sunday - wreaths laid on War Memorial in Glover St. British Legion parade prior to afternoon service in church and at Baptist Church in the evening. {Baptist Church}- "Strict and Particular"-communicants only those baptised by immersion.Rev.Foster, Pastor for 24 years.
